sense.name: 安全, safety,
sense.commentary: The condition of not being in danger or of not being dangerous, mostly physical.
sense.examples:
道口安全 crossing safety
安全转移 Move to places of safety.
安全地点 a place of safety

sense.name: security,安全
sense.commentary: Freedom from danger, physical or mental.
sense.examples:
政府保障国家的安全。 The government looks after the security of the country.
他出卖的情报有可能危害国家安全。 He sold information that may have damaged our national security.
安全感 a sense of security
